text: @SenSchumer @cryborg @senatemajldr @SpeakerPelosi Why not #ImpeachTrumpAgain for #DepravedIndifference Trump LET #COVID19 come in, lied about it, fired the scientists in China studying it, AND said, "Inject Bleach or light"? It's not as if #MoscowMitch is going to pass anything. #InvestigateThat Why is GOP closing polling places
